title: Colonial Williamsburg
brief_description: Williamsburg - for 80 years the capital of England’s Virginia colony - has been restored to its former appearance and today is the only city in America that actually portrays it colonial heritage in its proper setting. Visitors may see how is actually was in the 17th century.
